body:
Hello.  Long time no talk.

So I have a question that.  I have looked EVERYWHERE and I can't seem to find the answer, so I am coming to you guys :)
I have GTA SA ( yes I still play that game get over it ) and I want to get the police mod.  But the catch is, I am using a Mac ( yes I have a mac get over it ).  I can't find any tutorials on how to install the mod and I can't figure it out on my own.  So my question is, can you even play the police mod on a mac, and if you can, can you PLEASE give me a step by step because there aren't any that I could find.

Thank you
-Yo homie Da Kiwi

title: Help meh

replies.body: If there is no Tutorials to install the mod for mac, there is no mod for Mac?
replies.body_tagged: If there is no Tutorials to install the mod for mac, there is no mod for Mac?

replies.body: If google doesnt have the answer your probably screwed, rip in kiwi
replies.body_tagged: If google doesnt have the answer your probably screwed, rip in kiwi

replies.body: Perhaps you could follow a PC tutorial, but just do the Mac equivalent of everything?
replies.body_tagged: Perhaps you could follow a PC tutorial, but just do the Mac equivalent of everything?
